channel.title: How do you start All You Can Eat?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "How do you start All You Can Eat?"

item.title: Re: How do you start All You Can Eat?
item.content:encoded: You do have to be a special jonin.

item.title: Re: How do you start All You Can Eat?
item.content:encoded: Was wondering if you had to be a special jonin or just never paid attention first time through for special mission level ups

item.title: Re: How do you start All You Can Eat?
item.content:encoded:
Yeah, I checked in with Random Village, and they said the same thing. Tomorrow I'm going to group up with Fletch, Robogirl and MC Stripeypants and just run Nin Reaper missions for all my stamina on the hopes that I walk away with the Jaws. But with that setup, I think I only have an 85% chance of completing the mission, even if I use the proper Kido :(

I really need to get K-Dog's headband.

item.title: Re: How do you start All You Can Eat?
item.content:encoded:
Concerning the Hollow jawsâ€¦ they're found in reaper nin-A-mission "Destroy a Hollow Stronghold" d=15/s=11 (i think.)
and as you said, only found when doing that sp-mission

item.title: Re: How do you start All You Can Eat?
item.content:encoded: I'm working on emo pics and CD's also so I may as well keep bo also. As long as I'm stuck farming D-Rank missions for lil whitey I may as well get some items out of it.

item.title: Re: How do you start All You Can Eat?
item.content:encoded: It looks like you're going to need a lot of Tasty Burgers for All You Can Eat 2. Though, we don't even know what that mission's for yet. I'm stuck at 49 burgers right now. There's someone else who's about 1 step ahead of me, but he hasn't checked in today yet.

item.title: Re: How do you start All You Can Eat?
item.content:encoded: Oh. Hehe, well at least I have his chips for when I get there then. May as well keep him in my party and save up tasty burgers :P

item.title: Re: How do you start All You Can Eat?
item.content:encoded: I think you need to be special jonin for all Lvl. 2 allies. At least, I'm pretty sure. I ended up rushing to Special Jonin so I didn't really get a good sense of what Chunin were limited to.

item.title: How do you start All You Can Eat?
item.content:encoded: I have the 12 bags of chips, not sure how to actually start the mission though :P
